original_english: If you have a weakened immune system due to AIDS, cancer, transplantation, or corticosteroid use, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or shortness of breath.
translated_spanish: Si su sistema inmunitario está debilitado debido al SIDA, cáncer, trasplante o uso de corticosteroides, llame a su médico si desarrolla tos, fiebre o dificultad para respirar.
back_translated_english: If your immune system is weakened due to AIDS, cancer, a transplant, or the use of corticosteroids, call your doctor if you develop coughing, fever, or difficulty breathing.

original_english: Do NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected or if it makes the victim uncomfortable.
translated_spanish: NO coloque a la persona en esta posición si sospecha de una lesión en la cabeza, el cuello, la espalda o las piernas, o si le causa incomodidad al afectado.
back_translated_english: Do not place the person in this position if you suspect a head, neck, back, or leg injury, or if it causes discomfort to the affected individual.

original_english: Increased vision allows the infant to tell objects apart from backgrounds with very little contrast (such as a button on a blouse of the same color)
translated_spanish: El aumento de la visión permite al bebé distinguir objetos del fondo con muy poco contraste (como un botón en una blusa del mismo color).
back_translated_english: Improved vision allows the infant to distinguish objects from the background with very little contrast (such as a button on a blouse of the same color).

original_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.
translated_spanish: Si la obesidad te impide ser físicamente capaz de inspeccionar tus pies, pídele a un familiar, vecino o enfermera visitante que realice esta importante revisión.
back_translated_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important examination.

original_english: CT scan or MRI to confirm that there is a growth, and to see if the cancer has spread to lymph nodes in the neck
translated_spanish: Tomografía computarizada o resonancia magnética para confirmar la presencia de un crecimiento y ver si el cáncer se ha extendido a los ganglios linfáticos en el cuello
back_translated_english: A CT scan or MRI to confirm the presence of a growth and determine if cancer has spread to the lymph nodes in the neck.

original_english: A uniform brown color is usually seen over the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip.It is most often symmetrical (matching on both sides of the face).
translated_spanish: Se observa generalmente un color marrón uniforme en las mejillas, frente, nariz o labio superior. Suele ser simétrico (igual en ambos lados de la cara).
back_translated_english: A generally uniform brown color is observed on the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip. It usually appears symmetrical (the same on both sides of the face).

original_english: Your doctor may do other tests to check high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes of, and risk factors for TIAs or stroke.
translated_spanish: Su médico puede realizar otros exámenes para verificar la presión arterial alta, enfermedades del corazón, diabetes, colesterol alto y otras causas y factores de riesgo de AIT o accidente cerebrovascular.
back_translated_english: Your doctor may perform other tests to verify high blood pressure, heart diseases, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes and risk factors of TIA or stroke.

original_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical breathing sound caused by a blockage in the throat or voice box (larynx).It is usually heard when taking in a breath.
translated_spanish: La estridor es un sonido respiratorio anormal, agudo y musical causado por una obstrucción en la garganta o caja de voz (laringe). Generalmente se escucha al inhalar.
back_translated_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical respiratory sound caused by an obstruction in the throat or voice box (larynx). It is usually heard during inhalation.

original_english: Is there blood on the toilet paper only?
translated_spanish: ¿Hay sangre solo en el papel higiénico?
back_translated_english: Is there blood only on the toilet paper?

original_english: Ask your health care provider.
translated_spanish: Pregunte a su médico.
back_translated_english: Ask your doctor.

original_english: Complete bed rest for several days is usually recommended.
translated_spanish: El reposo en cama completo durante varios días generalmente se recomienda.
back_translated_english: Complete bed rest for several days is generally recommended.

original_english: They still have foot problems after treatment
translated_spanish: Todavía tienen problemas en los pies después del tratamiento
back_translated_english: They still have problems in their feet after treatment

original_english: Disorders of the endocrine system
translated_spanish: Trastornos del sistema endocrino
back_translated_english: Endocrine system disorders

original_english: Biopsy - breast; Open breast biopsy
translated_spanish: Biopsia - mama; Biopsia abierta de la mama
back_translated_english: Breast biopsy; Open breast biopsy

original_english: Are illegal drugs being used?
translated_spanish: ¿Se están usando drogas ilegales?
back_translated_english: Are illegal drugs being used?

original_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.
translated_spanish: Las medidas preventivas varían dependiendo del trastorno específico.
back_translated_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.

original_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or may test different specimens.
translated_spanish: Algunos laboratorios usan diferentes medidas o pueden evaluar distintas muestras.
back_translated_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or can evaluate different specimens.

original_english: Menopause. A drop in the hormone estrogen causes vaginal dryness.
translated_spanish: Menópausia. Una caída en el hormona estrógeno causa resequedad vaginal.
back_translated_english: Menopause. A decrease in the hormone estrogen causes vaginal dryness.

original_english: Depression and older age are both risk factors for suicide.
translated_spanish: La depresión y la edad avanzada son ambos factores de riesgo para el suicidio.
back_translated_english: Depression and advanced age are both risk factors for suicide.

original_english: Most women have only one polyp, but some women have two or three.
translated_spanish: La mayoría de las mujeres tiene un solo pólipo, pero algunas tienen dos o tres.
back_translated_english: Most women have a single polyp, but some have two or three.

original_english: This test is done to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.
translated_spanish: Este examen se realiza para medir el nivel de aminoácidos en la sangre.
back_translated_english: This test is performed to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.

original_english: The infection is spread by saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.
translated_spanish: La infección se transmite por saliva, orina, gotitas respiratorias, contacto sexual y transfusiones de sangre.
back_translated_english: The infection is transmitted by saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.

original_english: You may occasionally eat lean, 3-ounce cuts of red meat.
translated_spanish: Puede comer ocasionalmente cortes magros de carne roja de 3 onzas.
back_translated_english: May occasionally eat lean cuts of red meat, 3 ounces.

original_english: Several conditions may cause increased pressure in the skull, including:
translated_spanish: Varias condiciones pueden causar un aumento de la presión dentro del cráneo, incluyendo:
back_translated_english: Various conditions can cause an increase in pressure within the skull, including:

original_english: Abnormal heart sounds
translated_spanish: Ruidos cardíacos anormales
back_translated_english: Abnormal heart sounds

original_english: Waxy, yellow surface
translated_spanish: Superficie cerosa y amarilla
back_translated_english: Cerotic and yellow surface

original_english: Oxygen
translated_spanish: Oxígeno
back_translated_english: Oxygen

original_english: Recent open heart surgery
translated_spanish: Cirugía cardíaca abierta reciente
back_translated_english: Recent open heart surgery

original_english: Thyroid disease
translated_spanish: Enfermedad tiroidea
back_translated_english: Thyroid disease

original_english: Nausea
translated_spanish: Náuseas
back_translated_english: Nausea

original_english: Brussels sproutsCabbage
translated_spanish:
Coliflor
Repollo
back_translated_english:
Cauliflower
Cabbage

original_english: Oysters
translated_spanish: Ostras
back_translated_english: Oysters

original_english: CPR can be lifesaving, but it is best done by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.
translated_spanish: La RCP puede ser salvadora de vidas, pero es mejor que la realice alguien capacitado en un curso de RCP acreditado.
back_translated_english: CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) can be lifesaving, but it is best performed by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.

original_english: Always let your doctor know about any cold, flu, fever, herpes breakout, or other illnesses you may have.
translated_spanish: Siempre informe a su médico sobre cualquier resfrío, gripe, fiebre, brote de herpes u otras enfermedades que pueda tener.
back_translated_english: Always inform your doctor about any colds, flu, fever, herpes outbreak, or other illnesses you may have.

original_english: Tretinoin (Retin-A) or creams containing alpha-hydroxy acids may be recommended, but these aren't guaranteed to help.
translated_spanish: Se puede recomendar tretinoína (Retin-A) o cremas que contengan ácidos alfa-hidroxi, pero no están garantizados para ayudar.
back_translated_english: Tretinoína (Retin-A) or creams containing alpha hydroxy acids may be recommended, but they are not guaranteed to help.

original_english: Fever is the classic symptom and may persist for days before any other symptoms appear.
translated_spanish: La fiebre es el síntoma clásico y puede persistir durante días antes de que aparezcan otros síntomas.
back_translated_english: Fever is the classic symptom and can persist for days before other symptoms appear.

original_english: There is more likely to be increased amounts of pollen in the air on hot, dry, windy days.
translated_spanish: Es más probable que haya mayores cantidades de polen en el aire durante los días calurosos, secos y ventosos.
back_translated_english: It is more likely that there will be greater amounts of pollen in the air during hot, dry, and windy days.

original_english: You get iron through certain foods, and your body also reuses iron from old red blood cells.
translated_spanish: Obtienes hierro a través de ciertos alimentos y tu cuerpo también recicla el hierro de los glóbulos rojos viejos.
back_translated_english: You obtain iron through certain foods and your body also recycles the iron from old red blood cells.

original_english: Asthma symptoms usually occur much less often or disappear as the child gets get older.
translated_spanish: Los síntomas del asma suelen ocurrir mucho menos a menudo o desaparecer conforme el niño va creciendo.
back_translated_english: Asthma symptoms usually occur much less often or disappear as the child grows.

original_english: Potatoes that are not green and have had any sprouts removed are safe to eat.
translated_spanish: Las papas que no estén verdes y de las cuales se hayan retirado los brotes son seguras para consumir.
back_translated_english: Potatoes that are not green and from which the sprouts have been removed are safe to consume.

original_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain, or only a prick or stinging sensation.
translated_spanish: Cuando se introduce la aguja para extraer la sangre, puede sentir un dolor moderado o sólo un pinchazo o picadura.
back_translated_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain or only a prick or stinging sensation.

original_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies for an individual, it can continue to affect the person long term.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, como regla general, una vez que una sustancia provoca alergias en un individuo, puede seguir afectándolo a largo plazo.
back_translated_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies in an individual, it can continue to affect them over the long term.

original_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will likely increase but it will not improve your chances of getting a woman pregnant.
translated_spanish: Si tienes cirugía, probablemente tu conteo de espermatozoides aumentará, pero no mejorará tus posibilidades de embarazar a una mujer.
back_translated_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will probably increase, but it will not improve your chances of impregnating a woman.

original_english: Screening women with pelvic ultrasound or blood tests, such as the Ca-125 has not been found to be effective and is not recommended.
translated_spanish: El cribado de mujeres con ecografía pélvica o pruebas de sangre, como el CA-125, no se ha encontrado que sea efectivo y no se recomienda.
back_translated_english: Screening of women with pelvic ultrasound or blood tests, such as CA-125, has not been found to be effective and is not recommended.

original_english: Protein can also be used by the body for energy, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate stores have been used up.
translated_spanish: La proteína también puede ser utilizada por el cuerpo para obtener energía, pero solo después de que se hayan agotado las reservas de glucógeno o carbohidratos.
back_translated_english: Protein can also be used by the body to obtain energy, but only after the glycogen or carbohydrate reserves have been depleted.

original_english: An extradural hemorrhage is bleeding between the inside of the skull and the outer covering of the brain (called the "dura").
translated_spanish: Una hemorragia extradural es un sangrado entre el interior del cráneo y la cubierta externa del cerebro (llamada "dura").
back_translated_english: An epidural hemorrhage is bleeding between the inside of the skull and the external covering of the brain (called 'dura').

original_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot connect to the cell surface and protect the cell from substances in the blood called complement.
translated_spanish: Sin PIG-A, las proteínas importantes no pueden unirse a la superficie celular y protegerla de sustancias en la sangre llamadas complemento.
back_translated_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot bind to the cell surface and protect it from substances in the blood called complement.

original_english: If you can see bone in the injured site, call your local emergency number (such as 911) or local hospital for further advice.
translated_spanish: Si puede ver hueso en el sitio de la lesión, llame al número local de emergencias (como el 911 en los Estados Unidos) o al hospital local para obtener más recomendaciones.
back_translated_english: If you can see bone at the site of the injury, call your local emergency number (such as 911 in the United States) or the local hospital for further advice.

original_english: Bladder distention (urinary bladder over-filled with fluid) can cause a firm mass in the center of the lower abdomen above the pelvic bones.In extreme cases it can reach as far up as the navel.
translated_spanish: La distensión vesical (vejiga urinaria sobrecargada de líquido) puede causar una masa firme en el centro del abdomen inferior, por encima de los huesos pélvicos. En casos extremos, puede llegar tan arriba como el ombligo.
back_translated_english: Bladder distension (overfilled urinary bladder) can cause a firm mass in the lower central abdomen, above the pelvic bones. In extreme cases, it may extend as high as the navel.

original_english: Your kidneys help control your body's acid level by removing acid from the blood and sending it into your urine.Acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.
translated_spanish: Tus riñones ayudan a controlar el nivel de ácido en tu cuerpo al eliminarlo de la sangre y enviarlo a la orina. Las sustancias ácidas del cuerpo son contrarrestadas por sustancias alcalinas, principalmente bicarbonato.
back_translated_english: Your kidneys help control the acid level in your body by removing it from the blood and sending it to the urine. The acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.

original_english: You'll likely be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and have signs that you've had a previous strep infection.
translated_spanish: Probablemente te diagnosticarán con fiebre reumática si cumples dos criterios principales o uno principal y dos secundarios, y presentas signos de haber tenido una infección previa por estreptococos.
back_translated_english: You will probably be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria or one major and two minor criteria, and present signs of having had a previous streptococcal infection.

original_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest between the ribs and into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium).A small amount of fluid is taken out.
translated_spanish: Un médico entrenado, con frecuencia un cardiólogo, introducirá una pequeña aguja en el tórax entre las costillas y hasta el saco delgado que rodea el corazón (el pericardio). Se extraerá una pequeña cantidad de líquido.
back_translated_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, will insert a small needle into the chest between the ribs and up to the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium). A small amount of fluid is removed.

original_english: Increased calcium for a limited period of time does not normally cause side effects.However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over a long period of time raises the risk of kidney stones in some people.
translated_spanish: Un aumento de calcio durante un período limitado de tiempo no suele causar efectos secundarios. Sin embargo, recibir cantidades más altas de calcio durante un largo periodo de tiempo aumenta el riesgo de cálculos renales en algunas personas.
back_translated_english: A temporary increase in calcium usually does not cause side effects. However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over a long period increases the risk of kidney stones in some people.

original_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to have psychological and social problems.Children and adolescents generally want to be the same as their peers, and early sexual development can make them appear different.
translated_spanish: Los niños con desarrollo sexual precoz tienen más probabilidades de presentar problemas psicológicos y sociales. Los niños y adolescentes suelen querer ser como sus compañeros, y el desarrollo sexual precoz puede hacerlos parecer diferentes.
back_translated_english: Children with precocious sexual development are more likely to experience psychological and social problems. Children and adolescents typically want to be like their peers, and precocious sexual development can make them appear different.

original_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other.Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.
translated_spanish: Las venas y las arterias varían en tamaño de un paciente a otro y de un lado del cuerpo al otro. Obtener una muestra de sangre de algunas personas puede ser más difícil que de otras.
back_translated_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other. Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.

original_english: In many cases it will prevent you from getting sick.For example, a person who has had chickenpox or has been immunized against chickenpox is immune from getting chickenpox again.Watch this video about:Immune response
translated_spanish: En muchos casos, esto evitará que usted se enferme. Por ejemplo, una persona que haya tenido varicela o haya sido inmunizada contra la varicela es inmune a volver a tenerla. Mira este video sobre: respuesta inmunitaria.
back_translated_english: In many cases, this will prevent you from becoming ill. For example, a person who has had chickenpox or has been immunized against it is immune to getting it again. Watch this video about: immune response.

original_english: For example, a food that has 13 grams of fat with a Percent Daily Value of 20% means that 13 grams of fat is 20%, or one-fifth, of the total daily fat recommended for a person who eats 2,000 calories per day.
translated_spanish: Por ejemplo, un alimento que contiene 13 gramos de grasa con un Valor Diario porcentual del 20% significa que los 13 gramos de grasa representan el 20%, o una quinta parte, de la cantidad total diaria de grasa recomendada para una persona que consume 2.000 calorías al día.
back_translated_english: For example, a food that contains 13 grams of fat with a Daily Value percentage of 20% means that the 13 grams of fat represent 20%, or one-fifth, of the total daily recommended amount of fat for a person consuming 2,000 calories per day.

original_english: Laparoscopic repair: Your surgeon will make 3 - 5 small cuts in your belly.Your surgeon will insert a laparoscope (a thin, hollow tube with a tiny camera on the end) through one of these cuts and other tools through the other cuts.
translated_spanish: Reparación laparoscópica: El cirujano hará de 3 a 5 cortes pequeños en el abdomen. Insertará un laparoscopio (un tubo delgado y hueco con una cámara diminuta en el extremo) por uno de estos cortes y otras herramientas por los demás cortes.
back_translated_english: Laparoscopic repair: The surgeon will make 3 to 5 small incisions in the abdomen. They will insert a laparoscope (a thin, hollow tube with a tiny camera at the end) through one of these incisions and other instruments through the remaining incisions.

original_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea, and suggest that these medications can be used in children with tics who also have attention-deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children).A chronic motor tic disorder also exists.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, estudios recientes no respaldan esta idea y sugieren que estos medicamentos pueden ser utilizados en niños con tics que también tienen trastorno por déficit de atención (lo cual a menudo ocurre en el mismo grupo de niños). También existe un trastorno del tic motor crónico.
back_translated_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea and suggest that these medications can be used in children with tics who also have attention deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children). There is also a chronic motor tic disorder.

original_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed because this gives the MRSA germ a way to “get in.” Symptoms are also more likely in areas where there is more body hair due to hair follicles.
translated_spanish: Es más probable que estos síntomas ocurran si la piel ha sido cortada o frotada, ya que esto da al germen de MRSA una forma de "entrar". Los síntomas también son más probables en áreas donde hay más vello corporal debido a los folículos pilosos.
back_translated_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed, as this provides an entry point for the MRSA germ. Symptoms are also more probable in areas with more body hair due to hair follicles.

original_english: Some patients develop heart failure and high blood pressure in the blood vessels of their lungs.Your chances of recovering or of the disease getting worse depend on the cause and how severe the disease was when it was first diagnosed.
translated_spanish: Algunos pacientes desarrollan insuficiencia cardíaca y presión arterial alta en los vasos sanguíneos de sus pulmones. Sus posibilidades de recuperación o de que la enfermedad empeore dependen de la causa y de cuán severa era la enfermedad cuando fue diagnosticada por primera vez.
back_translated_english: Some patients develop heart failure and high blood pressure in the blood vessels of their lungs. Their chances of recovery or worsening of the disease depend on the cause and how severe the disease was when it was first diagnosed.

original_english: If a young child refuses to put weight on an arm or leg after an accident, won't move the arm or leg, or you can clearly see a deformity, assume the child has a broken bone and get medical help.
translated_spanish: Si un niño pequeño se niega a poner peso en un brazo o pierna después de un accidente, no mueve el brazo o la pierna, o si puede verse claramente una deformidad, asuma que el niño tiene un hueso roto y obtenga ayuda médica.
back_translated_english: If a young child refuses to put weight on an arm or leg after an accident, does not move the arm or leg, or if there is clearly visible deformity, assume that the child has a broken bone and seek medical help.

original_english: The amount of liquid you eat (such as soup) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce.You will be told what you may and may not eat to reduce the buildup of toxins that the kidneys would normally remove.
translated_spanish: La cantidad de líquido que consumas (como sopa) o bebas estará limitada a la cantidad de orina que puedas producir. Se te informará qué puedes y no puedes comer para reducir la acumulación de toxinas que los riñones normalmente eliminarían.
back_translated_english: The amount of fluid you consume (such as soup) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce. You will be informed about what you can and cannot eat to reduce the accumulation of toxins that the kidneys would normally eliminate.

original_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a disorder called sarcoidosis . People with sarcoidosis may have their ACE levels tested regularly to check the severity of the disease and see how well treatment is working.
translated_spanish: El uso más común de este examen es ayudar a diagnosticar y monitorear un trastorno llamado sarcoidosis. Las personas con sarcoidosis pueden someterse regularmente a pruebas de niveles de ACE para evaluar la gravedad de la enfermedad y ver cómo responde el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a disorder called sarcoidosis. People with sarcoidosis may undergo regular tests for ACE levels to assess the severity of the disease and see how they respond to treatment.

original_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear layer of tissue lining the eyelids and covering the white of the eye (conjunctiva) become swollen or inflamed due to a reaction to pollen, dander, mold, or other allergy-causing substances.
translated_spanish: La conjuntivitis alérgica ocurre cuando la capa clara de tejido que recubre los párpados y cubre la parte blanca del ojo (conjuntiva) se hincha o inflama debido a una reacción con el polen, pelusa, moho u otras sustancias causantes de alergias.
back_translated_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear layer of tissue that covers the eyelids and the white part of the eye (conjunctiva) swells or becomes inflamed due to a reaction with pollen, pet dander, mold, or other allergens.

original_english: Advance care directives allow patients to provide instructions about their preferences regarding the care they would like to receive if they develop an illness or a life-threatening injury and are unable to express their preferences.
translated_spanish: Los documentos de directrices anticipadas del cuidado permiten a los pacientes proporcionar instrucciones sobre sus preferencias respecto al cuidado que desean recibir si desarrollan una enfermedad o una lesión amenazante para la vida y son incapaces de expresar sus preferencias.
back_translated_english: Advance directives for care allow patients to provide instructions regarding their preferences for the care they wish to receive if they develop a life-threatening illness or injury and are unable to express their preferences.

original_english: People with this condition generally have a large left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies the body with blood), and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies the lungs with blood).
translated_spanish: Las personas con esta condición generalmente tienen un ventrículo izquierdo grande (la cámara de bombeo del corazón que suministra sangre al cuerpo), y un ventrículo derecho pequeño (la cámara de bombeo que suministra sangre a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: People with this condition generally have an enlarged left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies blood to the body), and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies blood to the lungs).

original_english: In January 2001, the FDA's Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition proposed that developers of bioengineered food submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.
translated_spanish: En enero de 2001, el Centro para la Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutrición Aplicada (CFSAN) de la FDA propuso que los desarrolladores de alimentos bioingenierizados presenten información científica y sobre seguridad a la FDA al menos 120 días antes de que se comercialice el alimento.
back_translated_english: In January 2001, the Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition (CFSAN) of the FDA proposed that developers of bioengineered foods submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.

original_english: Your health care provider will tell you if it's necessary to stop taking any drugs that may interfere with this test.Make sure that your doctor is aware of all drugs you are taking, both prescription and nonprescription.
translated_spanish: El proveedor de atención médica le indicará si es necesario dejar de tomar algún medicamento que pueda interferir con este examen. Asegúrese de que el médico esté al tanto de todos los medicamentos que está tomando, tanto recetados como sin receta.
back_translated_english: The health care provider will inform you if it is necessary to stop taking any medications that may interfere with this test. Make sure the doctor is aware of all the medications you are taking, both prescribed and over-the-counter.

original_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked greens, and canned salmon (with bones) will also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult to get children to consume adequate quantities of these foods.
translated_spanish: Otros alimentos como el brócoli, las verduras cocidas y el salmón enlatado (con huesos) también proporcionarán una fuente de calcio en la dieta; sin embargo, a menudo es difícil que los niños consuman cantidades adecuadas de estos alimentos.
back_translated_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked vegetables, and canned salmon (with bones) also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult for children to consume adequate amounts of these foods.

original_english: Transposition of the great vessels is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital). The two major vessels that carry blood away from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).
translated_spanish: Transposición de las grandes arterias es un defecto cardíaco que ocurre desde el nacimiento (cardiopatía congénita). Las dos principales arterias que llevan sangre lejos del corazón -- la aorta y la arteria pulmonar -- están invertidas (transpuestas).
back_translated_english: Transposition of the great arteries is a congenital heart defect that occurs from birth. The two main arteries that carry blood away from the heart—the aorta and the pulmonary artery—are inverted (transposed).

original_english: Your health care provider will examine you for signs of food poisoning, such as pain in the stomach and signs your body does not have as much water and fluids as it should.This is called dehydration.
translated_spanish: El médico realizará un examen para buscar signos de intoxicación alimentaria, como dolor en el estómago y síntomas que indican que su cuerpo no tiene la cantidad adecuada de agua y líquidos. Esto se llama deshidratación.
back_translated_english: The doctor will perform an examination to look for signs of food poisoning, such as stomach pain and symptoms indicating that the body does not have an adequate amount of water and fluids. This is called dehydration.

original_english: An implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of people who are at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by quickly sending an electrical shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.
translated_spanish: Un desfibrilador cardioversor implantable (DCI) es un dispositivo que puede ser implantado en la pared torácica de personas que están en riesgo de padecer este grave trastorno del ritmo. El DCI puede ayudar a prevenir la muerte súbita por causas cardiacas al enviar rápidamente una descarga eléctrica cuando ocurre la fibrilación ventricular.
back_translated_english: An implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of individuals who are at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by rapidly delivering an electrical shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.

original_english: Greater respect for the complexities of female sexual functioning has led them to conclude that suboptimal female genitalia may not be inherently better than suboptimal male genitalia, even if the reconstruction is "easier."In addition, other factors may be more important in gender satisfaction than functioning external genitals.
translated_spanish: Un mayor respeto por las complejidades de la función sexual femenina ha llevado a concluir que los genitales femeninos subóptimos no son inherentemente mejores que los genitales masculinos subóptimos, incluso si la reconstrucción es "más fácil". Además, otros factores pueden ser más importantes en la satisfacción de género que los genitales externos funcionales.
back_translated_english: A greater respect for the complexities of female sexual function has led to the conclusion that suboptimal female genitals are not inherently better than suboptimal male genitals, even if reconstruction is 'easier.' Additionally, other factors may be more important in gender satisfaction than functional external genitalia.

original_english: Regular use -- the user misses more and more school or work; worries about losing drug source; uses drugs to "fix" negative feelings; begins to stay away from friends and family; may change friends to those who are regular users; shows increased tolerance and ability to "handle" the drug.
translated_spanish: Uso regular -- el usuario faltan cada vez más a la escuela o al trabajo; se preocupa por perder la fuente de drogas; usa las drogas para "arreglar" los sentimientos negativos; comienza a alejarse de amigos y familiares; puede cambiar de amigos a aquellos que son usuarios regulares; muestra una tolerancia e habilidad aumentadas para "manejar" la droga.
back_translated_english: Regular use -- the user increasingly misses school or work; worries about losing access to drugs; uses drugs to 'fix' negative feelings; begins to distance themselves from friends and family; may switch friends to those who are regular users; shows increased tolerance and ability to 'handle' the drug.

original_english: Increased intracranial pressure can be due to a rise in cerebrospinal fluid pressure.It can also be due to increased pressure within the brain matter caused by a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding into the brain or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain matter itself.
translated_spanish: La presión intracraneal aumentada puede deberse al aumento de la presión del líquido cefalorraquídeo. También puede ser causada por un aumento de la presión dentro del tejido cerebral debido a una masa (como un tumor), hemorragia en el cerebro o fluido alrededor del cerebro, o hinchazón dentro del propio tejido cerebral.
back_translated_english: Increased intracranial pressure can be due to elevated cerebrospinal fluid pressure. It may also be caused by increased pressure within the brain tissue due to a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding in the brain, or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain tissue itself.

original_english: Some substances that are found to be harmful to people or animals may still be allowed, but only at the level of 1/100th of the amount that is considered harmful.People with any allergies or food intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.
translated_spanish: Algunas sustancias que se han encontrado dañinas para las personas o los animales aún pueden estar permitidas, pero solo a un nivel de 1/100 del monto considerado perjudicial. Las personas con alergias o intolerancias alimentarias siempre deben revisar la lista de ingredientes (etiqueta) por su propia protección.
back_translated_english: Some substances that have been found harmful to humans or animals may still be permitted, but only at a level of 1/100 of the amount considered harmful. People with food allergies or intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.

original_english: Not having milk in your diet can lead to a shortage of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein.You may need to find new ways to get calcium into your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need 1,000 - 1,500 mg of calcium each day):
translated_spanish: No tener leche en tu dieta puede llevar a una escasez de calcio, vitamina D, riboflavina y proteína. Puede que necesites encontrar nuevas formas de incorporar el calcio a tu dieta (dependiendo de tu edad y género, necesitas entre 1,000 - 1,500 mg de calcio cada día):
back_translated_english: Not having milk in your diet can lead to a deficiency of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein. You may need to find new ways to incorporate calcium into your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need between 1,000 - 1,500 mg of calcium each day):

original_english: Because it is difficult to determine the amount of radiation exposure from nuclear accidents, the best signs of the severity of the exposure are: the length of time between the exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of symptoms, and severity of changes in white blood cells.
translated_spanish: Debido a que es difícil determinar la cantidad de exposición a radiación proveniente de accidentes nucleares, los mejores signos de la severidad de la exposición son: el tiempo transcurrido entre la exposición y el inicio de los síntomas, la gravedad de los síntomas y la severidad de los cambios en las células blancas de la sangre.
back_translated_english: Because it is difficult to determine the amount of radiation exposure from nuclear accidents, the best indicators of the severity of the exposure are: the time elapsed between the exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of the symptoms, and the extent of changes in the white blood cells.

original_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is easier for a surgeon to make female genitalia than it is to make male genitalia), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.
translated_spanish: Nota: A menudo es técnicamente más fácil tratar (y por lo tanto criar) al niño como femenino (es más sencillo para un cirujano crear genitales femeninos que masculinos), por lo que en algunos casos se recomienda esto incluso si el niño es genéticamente varón.
back_translated_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is simpler for a surgeon to create female genitals than male), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.

original_english: Deficiency happens more often in women than in men, and is more common in pregnant women and older children. Getting enough iodine in the diet may prevent a form of physical and mental retardation called cretinism.Cretinism is very rare in the U.S. because iodine deficiency is generally not a problem.
translated_spanish: La deficiencia ocurre con más frecuencia en mujeres que en hombres, y es más común en mujeres embarazadas y niños mayores. Ingerir suficiente yodo en la dieta puede prevenir una forma de retraso físico y mental llamada cretinismo. El cretinismo es muy raro en los EE.UU. porque la deficiencia de yodo generalmente no es un problema.
back_translated_english: Deficiency occurs more frequently in women than in men, and is more common in pregnant women and older children. Consuming sufficient iodine in the diet can prevent a form of physical and mental retardation called cretinism. Cretinism is very rare in the U.S. because iodine deficiency generally is not a problem.

original_english: People who have a sudden herniated disk caused by injury (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will get nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medications (NSAIDs) and narcotic painkillers if they have severe pain in the back and leg.If you have back spasms, you will usually receive muscle relaxants.
translated_spanish: Las personas que sufren una hernia de disco aguda causada por un traumatismo (como un accidente automovilístico o levantar un objeto muy pesado) recibirán medicamentos antiinflamatorios no esteroideos (AINEs) y analgésicos narcóticos si tienen dolor severo en la espalda y la pierna. Si tiene espasmos musculares en la espalda, generalmente se le administrarán relajantes musculares.
back_translated_english: People who suffer from an acute herniated disc caused by trauma (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will receive nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and narcotic analgesics if they have severe back and leg pain. If they have muscle spasms in the back, muscle relaxants are usually administered.

original_english: Threre is a wide range for what is considered "normal." Just because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (meaning 85 out of 100 children weigh more), this number rarely means your child is sick, you're not feeding your child enough, or your breast milk is not enough for your baby.
translated_spanish: Hay un amplio rango de lo que se considera "normal". Solo porque su hijo esté en el percentil 15 para el peso (lo que significa que 85 de cada 100 niños pesan más), este número rara vez indica que su hijo está enfermo, no le está dando suficiente comida o la leche materna no es suficiente para su bebé.
back_translated_english: There is a wide range of what is considered 'normal'. Just because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (which means that 85 out of every 100 children weigh more), this number rarely indicates that your child is sick, not getting enough food, or that breast milk is insufficient for your baby.

original_english: Congenital heart surgery; Patent ductus arteriosus ligation; Hypoplastic left heart repair; Tetralogy of Fallot repair; Coarctation of the aorta repair; Atrial septal defect repair; Ventricular septal defect repair; Truncus arteriosus repair; Total anomalous pulmonary artery correction; Transposition of great vessels repair; Tricuspid atresia repair; VSD repair; ASD repair; PDA ligation
translated_spanish: Cirugía de corazón congénito; Ligadura del ductus arterioso persistente; Reparación de corazón izquierdo hipoplásico; Reparación de tetralogía de Fallot; Reparación de coartación de la aorta; Reparación de comunicación interauricular (CIA); Reparación de comunicación interventricular (CVI); Reparación de truncus arterioso; Corrección del conducto arterial pulmonar anómalo total; Reparación de transposición de grandes vasos; Reparación de atresia tricúspide; Reparación de VSD; Reparación de ASD; Ligadura de PDA
back_translated_english: Congenital heart surgery; Ligation of persistent ductus arteriosus; Repair of hypoplastic left heart syndrome; Repair of tetralogy of Fallot; Repair of aortic coarctation; Repair of atrial septal defect (ASD); Repair of ventricular septal defect (VSD); Repair of truncus arteriosus; Correction of total anomalous pulmonary venous return; Repair of transposition of the great arteries; Repair of tricuspid atresia; Repair of VSD; Repair of ASD; Ligation of PDA

original_english: This test is done during a hospital stay.  It tells the difference between someone who is making urine because of drinking a lot of liquid and someone who is not.  If you have central diabetes insipidus, you will still make a lot of urine even when fluids are not given.
translated_spanish: Este examen se realiza durante una estancia hospitalaria.  Indica la diferencia entre alguien que produce orina debido al consumo de grandes cantidades de líquido y alguien que no lo hace.  Si tienes diabetes insípida central, seguirás produciendo mucha orina incluso cuando no se le administren fluidos.
back_translated_english: This test is conducted during a hospital stay. It indicates the difference between someone who produces urine due to consuming large quantities of liquid and someone who does not. If you have central diabetes insipidus, you will continue to produce a lot of urine even when fluids are not administered.

original_english: Also, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are marked "enriched." It is healthiest to get carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in as natural a form as possible -- for example, from fruit instead of table sugar.
translated_spanish: Además, muchos alimentos refinados, como la harina blanca, el azúcar y el arroz blanco, carecen de vitaminas del complejo B y otros nutrientes importantes a menos que estén marcados como 'enriquecidos'. Es más saludable obtener carbohidratos, vitaminas y otros nutrientes en una forma lo más natural posible -- por ejemplo, de fruta en lugar de azúcar refinada.
back_translated_english: Additionally, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are marked as 'enriched.' It is healthier to obtain carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in their most natural form whenever possible -- for example, from fruit instead of refined sugar.

original_english: The pituitary gland near the brain makes too much of the hormone ACTH (called Cushing's disease), which may happen with too much growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor of the pituitary gland, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH
translated_spanish: La hipófisis cerca del cerebro produce demasiada hormona corticotropina (llamado enfermedad de Cushing), lo cual puede ocurrir debido al crecimiento excesivo de la glándula, un tumor en la misma o un tumor en otra parte del cuerpo (como el páncreas, el pulmón y la tiroides) que produce ACTH.
back_translated_english: The pituitary gland near the brain produces too much of the hormone ACTH (called Cushing's disease), which may occur due to excessive growth of the gland, a tumor in it, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH.

original_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally best to assign a gender as quickly as possible, often based on the external genitals rather than the chromosomal gender, and to instruct the parents to have no ambiguity in their minds as to the gender of the child.
translated_spanish: En el pasado, la opinión predominante era que generalmente era mejor asignar un género lo más pronto posible, a menudo basándose en los genitales externos en lugar del género cromosómico, e instruir a los padres para que no hubiera ambigüedad en sus mentes respecto al género del niño.
back_translated_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally better to assign a gender as soon as possible, often based on external genitalia rather than chromosomal gender, and instruct parents so there would be no ambiguity in their minds regarding the child's gender.

original_english: Daily preoccupation -- the user loses any motivation; does not care about school and work; has obvious behavior changes; thinking about drug use is more important than all other interests, including relationships; the user becomes secretive; may begin dealing drugs to help support habit; use of other, harder drugs may increase; legal problems may increase.
translated_spanish: Preocupación diaria -- el usuario pierde cualquier motivación; no le importa la escuela ni el trabajo; presenta cambios de comportamiento evidentes; pensar en el consumo de drogas es más importante que todos los demás intereses, incluidas las relaciones; el usuario se vuelve secreto; puede comenzar a traficar drogas para ayudar a sostener el hábito; el uso de otras drogas más duras puede aumentar; los problemas legales pueden aumentar.
back_translated_english: Daily concern -- the user loses any motivation; does not care about school or work; exhibits evident behavioral changes; thinking about drug use becomes more important than all other interests, including relationships; the user becomes secretive; may begin trafficking drugs to sustain the habit; the use of harder drugs may increase; legal problems may worsen.

original_english: You have sudden, sharp chest pain with shortness of breath, especially after a long trip, a stretch of bedrest (for example, following an operation), or other lack of movement, especially if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be a blood clot, part of which has moved to the lungs).
translated_spanish: Tienes dolor torácico repentino y agudo con dificultad para respirar, especialmente después de un viaje largo, un período prolongado en cama (por ejemplo, tras una operación), o falta de movimiento, sobre todo si una pierna está hinchada o más que la otra (esto podría ser un coágulo sanguíneo que se ha desplazado a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: You have sudden and severe chest pain with difficulty breathing, especially after a long trip, prolonged bed rest (such as following surgery), or lack of movement, particularly if one leg is swollen or more than the other (this could be a blood clot that has moved to the lungs).

original_english: The mother may fake symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or stool, withholding food, falsifying fevers, secretly giving the child drugs to make the child throw up or have diarrhea, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous (given through a vein) lines to make the child appear or become ill.
translated_spanish: La madre puede simular síntomas de enfermedad en su hijo al añadir sangre a la orina o heces del niño, rehusar alimentarlo, falsificar fiebres, administrar secretamente medicamentos al niño para provocar vómitos o diarrea, o usar otros trucos, como infectar líneas intravenosas (insertadas en una vena) para hacer que el niño parezca o se enferme.
back_translated_english: The mother may simulate symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or feces, refusing to feed them, fabricating fevers, secretly administering medications to the child to induce vomiting or diarrhea, or using other tricks such as infecting intravenous lines (inserted into a vein) to make the child appear ill.

original_english: Because there is little or no flow out of the left heart, blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (a hole connecting the collecting chambers on the left and right sides of the heart) back to the right side of the heart.
translated_spanish: Porque el flujo desde el lado izquierdo del corazón es mínimo o nulo, la sangre que regresa al corazón desde los pulmones necesita pasar a través del foramen oval o una comunicación interauricular (un orificio que conecta las cámaras colectoras de los lados izquierdo y derecho del corazón) hacia el lado derecho del corazón.
back_translated_english: Because the flow from the left side of the heart is minimal or nonexistent, blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (a passage that connects the collecting chambers on the left and right sides of the heart) toward the right side of the heart.

original_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these tips:Try to place the tooth back in the mouth where it fell out, so it is level with other teeth. Bite down gently on gauze or a wet tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.
translated_spanish: Puedes llevar el diente al dentista siguiendo uno de estos consejos: Intenta colocar el diente nuevamente en la boca donde se cayó, para que quede nivelado con los otros dientes. Presiona suavemente con gasa o una bolsita de té húmeda para ayudar a mantenerlo en su lugar. Ten cuidado de no tragar el diente.
back_translated_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist following one of these tips: Try placing the tooth back in its original position in the mouth so that it is level with the other teeth. Gently press it in place using gauze or a moist tea bag to help keep it there. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.

original_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only the other person." "It" may represent becoming pregnant or catching a sexually-transmitted disease after having unprotected sex, causing a car crash while driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or any of the many other negative effects of risk-taking behaviors.
translated_spanish: Otro mito de la adolescencia es la idea de que 'eso nunca me pasará a mí, solo al otro'. 'Eso' puede representar quedar embarazada o contraer una enfermedad de transmisión sexual después del sexo sin protección, causar un accidente automovilístico mientras se conduce bajo la influencia del alcohol u otras drogas, o cualquiera de los muchos otros efectos negativos de los comportamientos arriesgados.
back_translated_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that 'that will never happen to me, only to others.' 'That' can represent becoming pregnant or contracting a sexually transmitted disease after unprotected sex, causing an automobile accident while driving under the influence of alcohol or other drugs, or any of the many other negative effects of risky behaviors.

original_english: It is important to have the teeth cleaned thoroughly.This may involve use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper flossing and brushing is always needed, even after professional tooth cleaning, to reduce your risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and floss properly.
translated_spanish: Es importante que los dientes se limpien a fondo. Esto puede implicar el uso de diversas herramientas para aflojar y eliminar la placa y el sarro de los dientes. Siempre es necesario un cepillado y enjuague adecuados, incluso después de una limpieza profesional de los dientes, para reducir su riesgo de enfermedad periodontal. Su dentista o higienista le mostrará cómo cepillarse y usar el hilo dental correctamente.
back_translated_english: It is important that the teeth are thoroughly cleaned. This may involve using various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper brushing and rinsing are always necessary, even after a professional dental cleaning, to reduce your risk of periodontal disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and use floss correctly.

original_english: How well you do depends on the amount of poison swallowed and how quickly treatment is received.
translated_spanish: El pronóstico depende de la cantidad de veneno ingerido y de cuán rápido se reciba el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: The prognosis depends on the amount of poison ingested and how quickly treatment is received.

original_english: Rarely, children will have problems falling asleep or staying asleep.
translated_spanish: Raramente, los niños tendrán problemas para quedarse dormidos o mantenerse dormidos.
back_translated_english: Rarely, children will have problems falling asleep or staying asleep.

original_english: Reye syndrome can occur when aspirin is used to treat children with viral infections, such as chickenpox or the flu.
translated_spanish: El síndrome de Reye puede ocurrir cuando se utiliza ácido acetilsalicílico (aspirin) para tratar a niños con infecciones virales, como el sarampión o la gripe.
back_translated_english: Reye syndrome can occur when aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) is used to treat children with viral infections, such as measles or influenza.

original_english: Bili lights is a type of light therapy (phototherapy) that is used to treat newborn jaundice . Jaundice is a yellow coloring of the skin and eyes caused by too much of a substance called bilirubin.
translated_spanish: La terapia con luces biliáricas es un tipo de fototerapia que se utiliza para tratar la ictericia del recién nacido. La ictericia es una coloración amarillenta de la piel y los ojos causada por un exceso de una sustancia llamada bilirrubina.
back_translated_english: Phototherapy with bili lights is a type of phototherapy used to treat neonatal jaundice. Jaundice is a yellowish discoloration of the skin and eyes caused by an excess of a substance called bilirubin.

original_english: Surgery combined with radiation therapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high chance of returning, has spread to the lymph nodes, or is a grade 2 or 3.
translated_spanish: La cirugía combinada con la radioterapia se utiliza a menudo para tratar a mujeres con enfermedad en estadio 1 que tiene una alta probabilidad de recurrencia, ha invadido los ganglios linfáticos o es grado 2 o 3.
back_translated_english: Surgery combined with radiation therapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high probability of recurrence, has invaded the lymph nodes, or is grade 2 or 3.
